LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Admin.Settings.Preset.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose your color preset of the theme.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Admin.Settings.IsCategoryPageOneColumn.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to make all catalog pages in One Column.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Admin.Settings.IsHeaderInsideHomePageMainSlider
LocaleResource.Value: Place Header Inside Home Page Main Slider

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Admin.Settings.IsHeaderInsideHomePageMainSlider.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to place the header inside the home page main slider. This setting works only if you use the Anywhere Sliders plugin inside the "home_page_main_slider" widget zone.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Admin.Settings.IsMenuMobile.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable the mobile app menu look.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Admin.Settings.ItemBoxHoverEffect.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose the product item box hover effect

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Admin.Settings.EnableNewsletterPopup.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked the newsletter subscription popup will be shown on page load

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Admin.Settings.NewsletterPopupDelayedShow.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The number of milliseconds after the popup will show up (1 second = 1000ms)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Admin.Settings.NewsletterPopupBackgroundImageId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The image which will be shown as popup background

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Newsletter.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Subscribe to our newsletter and get information about our latest offers and prices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Newsletter.Popup.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Subscribe now to get 10% off on any product!

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Minimal.Newsletter.Popup.DontShow
LocaleResource.Value: Don’t show me this message again
